entry.title: Maltesers Celebration Size - 800g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars Inc.
Type: Chocolate
Price: 18.74

Celebration Time C'mon!!

It's time to celebrate Maltesers

Maltesers are a classic Old Fashioned & Nostalgic Candy from the 1930's. A delicious malt honeycomb center covered covered with milk chocolate. A crunchy and light snack. Believe it or not, but this amazing candy had made it all over the world but only recently was introduced to the United States. In 2017 Maltesers finally began being sold all over America. The chocolate is still produced in Newmarket Ontario, but a large majority of that is now exported. Finally Americans are able to enjoy something we've been snacking on for over 50 years!

Maltesers are one of the Top 10 Canadian Candies.

 

800g

entry.title: Willie's Cacao Milk Chocolate Praline Truffles - 110g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willie's Cacao
Type: Chocolate
Price: 11.97

Simply Sublime

Milk Chocolate with Sea Salt 

Not only do these Praline Truffles come in a beautiful package, but they are packed with a rich smooth milk chocolatey texture. As you bite into these truffles you will feel a slight crunch from freshly roasted hazelnuts. The Cornish sea salt adds a bittersweet taste that'll make you want to grab another one!

 About Willie's Cacao

    Willie's cacao journey all began with a simple love for adventure, which brought him to the beautiful land of Venezuela and lead him to buy the Hacienda El Tesoro (which roughly translates to the plantation of treasure!) back in 1996.
    High in the breathtaking cloud forest, this plot of land is home to 20,000 cacao trees and is so bio-diverse that it lays claim to 3% of the world's flora and 7% of the world's bird species. Willie would often be tripping over so many plants and fruits he had never heard of before that he began bringing them home to experiment with, making cream infusions of virtually every edible thing you could find.
    Cacao growers in most of the world today produce hybrid strains that grow bigger crops, but at the cost of flavour and aroma. Unaccepting of nothing but the finest, when Willie was first replanting the hacienda after having purchased it, he made it his mission to find beans with pure criollo characteristics. Eventually, he found a small plantation of 1,000 cacao trees within a coffee area that had been isolated. Without the ability to cross-pollinate with other plantations, Willie realized that these were the ones. Few things give him greater pleasure than watching it dawn on someone that all the flavour of the chocolate they're tasting comes simply from the cacao. 

(1 box contains 16 truffles) 110g

    Cacao growers in most of the world today produce hybrid strains that grow bigger crops, but at the cost of flavour and aroma. Unaccepting of nothing but the finest, when Willie was first replanting the hacienda after having purchased it, he made it his mission to find beans with pure criollo characteristics. entry.title: Willie's Cacao Golden Pod - 125g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willie's Cacao
Type: Chocolate
Price: 19.99

100% Natural. Pure Flavours. Pure Pleasure.

    Give someone the taste of exotic divinity with this beautiful cacao pod which opens up to reveal a treasure trove of Dark Chocolate Pearls. Each one is crafted using Chulucanas chocolate which features fruity notes of plum and raisin, filled with smooth and delicious molten caramel and topped off with delicate flakes of Cornish sea salt. This is a perfect gift for anyone you'd like to share a piece of heaven with.

About Willie's Cacao

    Willie's cacao journey all began with a simple love for adventure, which brought him to the beautiful land of Venezuela and lead him to buy the Hacienda El Tesoro (which roughly translates to the plantation of treasure!) back in 1996.

Unaccepting of nothing but the finest, when Willie was first replanting the hacienda after having purchased it, he made it his mission to find beans with pure criollo characteristics. Eventually, he found a small plantation of 1,000 cacao trees within a coffee area that had been isolated. Without the ability to cross-pollinate with other plantations, Willie realized that these were the ones. Few things give him greater pleasure than watching it dawn on someone that all the flavour of the chocolate they're tasting comes simply from the cacao. 

(1 pod) 125g

entry.title: Willie's Cacao Almendra 70% Dark Chocolate & Roasted Almonds - 50g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Willie's Cacao
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.19

100% Natural. Pure Flavours. Pure Pleasure.

    Rich dark chocolate packed with lightly roasted almonds, this delicious bar is made with smooth, nutty Sur del Lago chocolate. One bite of this bar and you'll be addicted to the intense nuttiness and crunch! All of Willie's Cacao chocolate is made from 'bean to bar' to ensure what you're tasting is simply the flavour notes straight from the cacao bean and nothing else. Craft made in small batches taking up to 21 days at low temperatures delivering only the finest quality for chocolate. Simply made with cocoa mass, cocoa butter, and raw cane sugar, and almonds, you've never had chocolate that has tasted so naturally delicious.

  • Vegan Friendly
  • Gluten-Free

About Willie's Cacao

    Willie's cacao journey all began with a simple love for adventure, which brought him to the beautiful land of Venezuela and lead him to buy the Hacienda El Tesoro (which roughly translates to the plantation of treasure!) back in 1996.
    High in the breathtaking cloud forest, this plot of land is home to 20,000 cacao trees and is so bio-diverse that it lays claim to 3% of the world's flora and 7% of the world's bird species. Willie would often be tripping over so many plants and fruits he had never heard of before that he began bringing them home to experiment with, making cream infusions of virtually every edible thing you could find.
    Cacao growers in most of the world today produce hybrid strains that grow bigger crops, but at the cost of flavour and aroma. Unaccepting of nothing but the finest, when Willie was first replanting the hacienda after having purchased it, he made it his mission to find beans with pure criollo characteristics. Eventually, he found a small plantation of 1,000 cacao trees within a coffee area that had been isolated. Without the ability to cross-pollinate with other plantations, Willie realized that these were the ones. Few things give him greater pleasure than watching it dawn on someone that all the flavour of the chocolate they're tasting comes simply from the cacao. 

(1 bar) 50g
